website_summaries.verdict: Lots of fun for younger kids thanks to easier controls and automated functions, though flight time is very short.
pros: These tiny battle drones pack a punch: they’re zippy but easy to control with one-key launch and returns
3 speed modes, quick flips and opponent altitude matching make drone combat more fun and less work
cons: Flying time is only 5-6 minutes on a battery charge

customer_reviews.title: kid drones
customer_reviews.text: These when they synced were fun to play with my small nephew who i cant use my better drone since it more expensive. It would sync 80% of time but other times I couldn't figure out what it was doing. Make sure you put them back in box or have shelve at eyelevel you put the drones on or it could get lost very easily. The controls were simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: How much fun
customer_reviews.text: This arrived yesterday and I usually don't leave a lot of reviews but this is such a fun toy! I played with my 2 sons for almost 2 hours and we couldn't stop...Great quality and would buy gain...
customer_reviews.author: Jochen Talmon

customer_reviews.title: Fun but breaks too easily/quickly
customer_reviews.text: Fun but breaks too quickly with normal use. Lots of plastic parts make them cheap, but also break easily and not enough spare parts to replace all the broken ones.
customer_reviews.author: Martin W

customer_reviews.title: It fell short.
customer_reviews.text: What a great concept. My little boy was so excited to get these for Christmas. He had the white one flying in no time. The black one like so many others could not get the trim fixed it would go in the air and constantly drift to the right. We never got to test the battle mode. And we also never got it to perform a flip like the instructions said it could.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Small but power !
customer_reviews.text: These drones are cool and funny. It is small, but it is very easy to control it. My nephew and I are fun when we played them. These drones are good and worth!

customer_reviews.title: Won't fly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's birthday and the drones don't fly consistently The black drone flew for a brief period then won't lift off the ground despite being fully charged. The white drone will only spin around and doesn't lift off the ground at all. I recharged it and now the black one is flying a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Martha C Kutko

customer_reviews.title: cannot get one of the drones to fly in control
customer_reviews.text: Able to get one of the drones to fly, the other one is very erratic once you try flying it. It just crashes into the wall, there is nothing I can do to control it. The other one flies perfectly and works great, unfortunately only having one drone that work defeats the purpose. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Travis bonifield

customer_reviews.title: Two stars for packaging.
customer_reviews.text: It has a great case. And it looks really cool. However both drones were uncontrollable. They randomly took off in odd directions. We're VERY experienced drone and copter pilots. We have very old mini copters and drones that still work. These do not. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Could never get both drones to sync!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy a different product. Tried for several days to sync both drones after reading and re-reading the instructions. Also, they are very small, and the one that did work we could never get to control well. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Broke within one day of use and since it was a Christmas gift it is past the small return window.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bloom

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Challenging for Beginners but Fun with Practice
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product- drone battles, kind of like video games- it takes practice and practice to get it. Small drones in rectangular box, easy enough to assemble, comes with remotes with multiple functions- speed, turns, flip&roll, right/left/backward trimmer, down, up, and with fire button. You can put it on auto takeoff. Like everything, an APP is useful but you can fly without. These little babies really move. They zip all over the place. At first and beyond, it was hard to control and keep track of them. They're well lit, and they're fairly durable, I guess, even with out newbee experience, and out of control play. Mesmerizing for sure. The kids like them. Folds for storage.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These are not as durable as I’d like, but they’re not super expensive and are certainly fun. User friendly but smaller children will certainly need constant supervision. These will help as practice with drones and build confidence and skill using drones. Move well and fairly easy to control. I was able to get a bit higher than I anticipated and still maintain control. Perfect size for beginners. I love the bright colors. I haven’t had any problems so far with the remote or link up. All the modes function well for me. I love the ability to take phone photos through them. It will automatically soft land when battery is low to prevent crashing from a high altitude.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: My boys loved this!
customer_reviews.text: This set was much better then I thought it would be. I have bought a lot of tiny drones for my boys to play with and all have been flown into nowhere land, or to a wall and broke, or the ground. This set was kinda of tricky to learn at first, and although it doesn't do exactly what the instructions say, it's pretty close. It does take some practice learning the remote and how to turn in on, land it and drive it, but once my boys mastered that, they loved to battle. They are still learning how to perfect their moves, but they enjoy this a lot. They are 7 and 9 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Fly
customer_reviews.text: These tiny, palm-size drones aren't all that easy to fly, though the two do work on different signals, so you can theoretically fly them at the same time. The idea is you can swoop and battle but in reality just getting them to fly up and stay in the air was a real challenge for my kids (7 and 11). My husband fared a little bit better, but I sure didn't, and we lost one drone (would no longer work) after just one play session. (In fairness, it did tumble out of the sky.) The have built-in rechargeable batteries that don't last for long—have to recharge after >15 min of flight time.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to lie, we got these little fellows as an Amazon Giveaway, we have never had drones before these ones but I can tell you they are awesome! Theu were super easy to set up and control and we have had so much fun "battling" each other. I received these sometime during the summer and they just wont disappoint! (My dogs are not fans them tho lol). Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Get Used to Then Fun
customer_reviews.text: These work maybe too good as one went right on our roof before my son could practice. Otherwise once you get the hang of the controls they are neat little drones. Good controllers and for the price it is awesome especially since you get two drones and controllers. Worth it for beginners because they are small. Controllers remind me of our Nintendo Switch controllers. Nice that it comes with a case to contain everything, never seen that before even with pricier drones we have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Kachelmuss

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun Mini Drones
customer_reviews.text: Our Daughter had a blast watching these fly around our living room and den. It took a few minutes for us to really get the hang of the controls. But once we did, they were great. Not difficult to use, easy to control. Didn't have any problems with fans nearby. I was able to land them in very specific places with no problems. Main thing was just making sure the cats didn't run off with them when they landed on the ground lol. We like them, we'd recommend them. Also pretty durable if they did fall.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Weyland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for most kids
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much any kid over 9 and under 30 will like this toy. It's probably more targeted at boys, but my daughter and her friends love it. Like most mini-drones, these things are hard to fly and the batteries only last a few minutes, but otherwise it's a totally fun set to goof around with. Comes with everything you need and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: Won't pair
customer_reviews.text: Too bad. This was such a cute set; but try as I might, neither drone would pair with either remote. I've flown lots of toy drone before; I'm no novice. I read the instructions to no avail. Either there's something wrong with the drones or the instructions are very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: These mini drones are so much fun. Great for beginners, but excellent quality. Battery life is great; these are well made. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K

customer_reviews.title: Age 6+ (?!?) Not a chance.
customer_reviews.text: These, like most inexpensive drones, are hard to control. Borderline impossible with a breeze. Irresponsible in any kind of closed quarters. Nice idea, though.
customer_reviews.author: Neurasthenic

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but tough.
customer_reviews.text: Tiny bit tough. Kids have played with this for hours of fun! Doesn’t hold a charge for a very long time but simple and easy to recharge for the next round.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McFerrin

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos Love This
customer_reviews.text: This drone is great fun for the kiddos. They have not lost it yet like the ones I have lost. I'm glad it is built well and easy to operate for them.
customer_reviews.author: Darlaina Dancer
